scripts.bootstrap: npm install && lerna bootstrap && npm run bootstrap:example
scripts.clean:all: npm run clean && npm run clean:node_modules && npm run clean:package_lock && npm run clean:example
scripts.publish:beta: lerna version && lerna exec -- npm publish
scripts.routine: npm run clean:all && npm run bootstrap && npm run check-packages && npm run zip
scripts.check-packages: npm run clean && npm run lint && npm run build && npm run test
scripts.example: npm run check-packages && cd example && npm run start
scripts.deploy: npm run check-packages && npm run publish
scripts.deploy:beta: npm run routine && git commit -am 'package.lock' && npm run publish:beta
